bill_title: make an appropriation to provide for an electronic message display board in the senate chamber.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation to provide for an electronic message display board in the senate chamber. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated out of any money in the general fund, not otherwise appropriated, the sum of twenty-nine thousand five hundred dollars ($29,500), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Legislative Research Council to provide for the purchase and installation of a message display board in the chamber of the South Dakota senate. Any funds not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2003, shall revert to the general fund in accordance with § 4-8-21. Section 2. The Legislative Research Council may accept and expend for the purposes of this Act, in addition to the amount in section 1 of this Act, any funds obtained from federal sources, gifts, contributions, or any other source if such acceptance and expenditure is approved in accordance with § 4-8B-10. Section 3. Expenditures authorized by this Act shall be paid on warrants drawn by the state auditor on vouchers approved by the director of the Legislative Research Council. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
